titles.title: Small Business Set Aside Extension Act of 2022
Small Business Set Aside Extension Act of 2022
To allow the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to extend the participation period for covered small business concerns in the 8(a) small business program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Small Business Set Aside Extension Act of 2022
This bill permits small businesses to extend their participation in the 8(a) Business Development program by one year.
